alert.note: Alert for Independence; Izard; Lawrence; Randolph; Sharp (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:28AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Independence, central Randolph, east central Izard, Lawrence and Sharp Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1028 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sidney, or 15 miles north of Batesville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walnut Ridge... Hoxie... Black Rock... Lake Charles State Park... Cave City... Imboden... Ravenden... College City... Portia... Mount Pleasant... Strawberry... Lynn... Sidney... Ravenden Springs... Minturn... Annieville... Dalton... Stella... Evening Shade... Smithville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas.
